LanguageData.LetterSCP939EntersText:
A pack of SCP939 have been spotted near the area. Be on the lookout.
While they may not enter the area immediately, they may wander in and hunt any humanoids in the vicinity.
LanguageData.LetterContainmentBreach: One or more SCPs are trying to escape containment!\n\nStop their advances or destroy them.
LanguageData.LetterSCP3199Attack:
A flock of SCP-3199 have appeared.

Contain or kill them.

They will probably leave the area in a few days, leaving a LOT of eggs behind.

Don't wait to get rid of the eggs, they will quickly spiral out of control.
LanguageData.LetterSCP131Join: A pair of SCP-131s, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem to adore human contact and are joining the colony.
LanguageData.LetterSCP529Join: A female SCP-529, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem to adore human contact and are joining the colony.
LanguageData.LetterSCP610Local: A few SCP-610 instances formed nearby.
LanguageData.LetterSCP2845Attack:
An SCP-2845 and its SCP-2845-1 minions have appeared.

Contain or kill them.

They will probably leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.Foundation_GenderStoneChange: SCP-113 changed the pawn's gender to
LanguageData.SCP.SuppressionField.ConfigureSuppressio: Configure the radius and strength of the suppression
LanguageData.SCP_AssignSCPDesc: Assign scp(s) to capture and keep in the cage.
LanguageData.ContainmentBreakMTBDaysDescription: The average days awake between containment breaks. This is affected by mood, mobility, the number of containment doors, and time since the last containment break.\n\nNote that this does not include time spent asleep.
LanguageData.FoundationSellPriceDescription: The base market value of this SCP if sold.
LanguageData.MinAnomalyPerColonist: Expecting at least {0} anomalies per colonist.
